alert.note: Alert for Central Phoenix; East Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 10:28PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1115 PM MST... At 1027 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tempe, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 152 and 164. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 179. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 163 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Central Phoenix; East Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
